description:
Yoshuu Academy assassin sent to kill Sousou while he was injured from a Yoshuu gang attack. She blinded Kakouton`s left eye with a hidden needle attack, causing Sousou to unleash his Dragon and kill Koshaji for revenge.
(edited from Wikipedia)
It is later revealed that this was actually set up by Shiba-i Chuutatsu and Kakuka, to awaken Sousou`s Dragon
name: Koshaji
